product_name: MACColor Excess Gel Pencil Waterproof Eyeliner
summary: SummaryMAC Color Excess Gel Pencil eyeliner is an ultra-pigmented, waterproof gel pencil eyeliner with 24+ hours of wear on lids and 12 hours of wear on waterlines.
details: DetailsBenefitsGel-like texture with precise-glide applicationWears for 24+ hours on lidsWears for 12 hours on waterlinesUltra-pigmented gel eyeliner color payoffWaterproofTransfer-proofSmudge-resistantTug-freeSafe for contact lens wearersOphthalmologist-testedFeaturesUnleash your inner graphic artist with MAC Color Excess Gel Pencil Waterproof Eyeliners in hi-def, ultimate-impact shades ranging from everyday wearable to bold brightsGel eyelinerLong-wearing on lids and waterlinesHighly pigmentedFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensFormaldehyde DonorsSodium Lauryl SulfateSodium LaurethsulfateTriclosanD&C Yellow No. 11OxybenzoneSynthetic Microbeads 5mm Or SmallerItem 2594997How To UseApply gel eyeliner directly to lids or waterlines.IngredientsIsododecane, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Candelilla Wax Hydrocarbons, Synthetic Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax Extract, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Dipentaerythrityl Pentaisononanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Trihydroxystearin, Synthetic Beeswax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Alumina, Benzyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Bronze Powder (CI 77400), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Copper Powder (CI 77400), Aluminum Powder (CI 77000), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply gel eyeliner directly to lids or waterlines.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Stay put liner
reviews.comments: I like that this liner does not creep down my face and smudge after wearing it. The only thing is that it does tend to fade a little by the end of the day . Overall , I'm very pleased with this item..

reviews.headline: Tip not sharp enough
reviews.comments: I do like this product but am disappointed the tip does not stay sharp for a finer line

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: This eyeliner lasts for 24 hours without fading down or smudging. I purchased this 3 times. Love the color of Sick Tat Bro, dark black brown shade.

reviews.headline: Pulls and Skips. Don't Recommend
reviews.comments: I loved the color and it make a smooth, clear line on the back of my hand. When I applied it to my lash line (top & bottom) it skipped and pilled. Took me several minutes to get a decent line. Wore off very quickly. I returned it and the brown one I bought at the same time.

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product
reviews.comments: Purchased this product during the beauty steals promotion.  At the sale price I gave it a try, because I will not pay full price without trying it first, as so many eyeliners leave smudges and doesn't stay fresh.  It did deliver a all day wear

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments:
i was not happy, it was not as smooth to apply 
As I would have liked it to be. I love Mac products, maybe the ingredients change. It just did not work for me. Hopefully in the future they will come out with something better. I don't mind given it a try again

reviews.headline: So far so good
reviews.comments:
Great color, non irritating and lasts full day 
Plan to get other colors!

reviews.headline: Stays on!
reviews.comments: Finally an eyeliner that stays on.   Goes on smooth too.

reviews.headline: i would continue buying this
reviews.comments: this is perfect for everyday use especially for night outs, does not smear and last for hours

reviews.headline: Love this Eyeliner!
reviews.comments: I really like this eyeliner.  The color in particular, as well as the ease in applying it.

reviews.headline: This is the perfect green!
reviews.comments: I have been searching through so many products to find the perfect olive green shade for my brown eyes. This product is gorgeous, long lasting, and glides on smooth. This is a great product!

reviews.headline: Buy, Buy, Buy
reviews.comments: Excellent product , applies smoothly and stays on with out smudging- would highly recommend!

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Not good

reviews.headline: This is my favorite eyeliner!!
reviews.comments: This eyeliner glides on smooth and makes your eyes pop!

reviews.headline: Everytime I buy one of these they drive our with 2/3rds left
reviews.comments: Is there a way to reconstitute this product because I had a blue one as well and they dry out with the lid on. I just don't get it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Best eyeliner for sensitive eyes. Stays on all day

reviews.headline: My favorite eyeliner
reviews.comments: This eyeliner is so easy to work with and I love that its retractable. It feels smoother than a pencil but not as messy as liquid eyeliner. So easy to fix up any mistakes and I always get compliments!

reviews.headline: The best eyeliner!
reviews.comments: These MAC eyeliners are the only ones that I use. I have tried many brands, this is the only brand that does not smear when it gets wet or is very hot outside! I love these MAC eyeliners!

reviews.headline: Silky feel
reviews.comments: I bought the pencil in dark brown and I love the way it glides on. It has a silky texture and is so easy to blend with a liner brush.

reviews.headline: Not quite as good as previous versions
reviews.comments:
I loved this eyeliner in the past for its ability to be smooth application and staying power.
This version of it was a disappointment especially for the price point. It didn't seem to go on easily and I had to apply way too many times to get a line in my watermark area.  won't buy again

faceoff_positive.comments: The MAC color excess pencil the name of the color is glide or die as rich black color. It has the consistency of a gel. Feels like a crayon when you glided over your lid. The black color is the richest I have seen and it's very bold. This is a twist type of pencil that you can twist to give you more pencil or twist to put away. So far I have worn the pencil for 24 hours without any smudges. I have also worried for 24 hours into my waterline without having any trips to my skin area. It glides very easily to my lid without transferring to the upper top of my under-brow area. Personally, I'm always looking for a pencil that I can place in my lid area without having it a few hours later transfer to the top of the lid area. Also is really hard to find a pencil that can cover completely my waterline and not transfer to the bottom skin area and this pencil does a great job of staying in place and not transferring and making me look like a raccoon. For the sake of testing the product I did wear it throughout my sleep and I was surprised that it did not transfer to my sheets or my pillowcase. I did a comparison between my L'oreal pencil and this MAC pencil and it was a big difference when it comes to durability and how long it stays on my lid and my waterline, this MAC pencil did stay longer. I did go to the KEYs a very humid and sunny beach area in Florida and despite all that, the makeup did stay in place all day. The benefit of owning this pencil it's that you really don't have to deal with a brush to apply the eyeliner you just grab the pencil push it out and slide it really easily with just this one product, no need for a separate brush. Is very easy to use and convenient. I would buy this product as I use a lot of eyeliner more than eyeshadow. My sister recommended me to use L'oreal for the long-lasting and I'm being waterproof, but this one is definitely a better choice when it comes to durability, long-lasting effect and water proof. Will recommend to her and her friends.
faceoff_positive.headline: Awesome 24 hr Duration Pencil

faceoff_negative.comments:
Pros: Color payoff is great. Gentle on the skin and even though it took a little work, it did apply and stay on the waterline. 
Doesn't smudge too much which is great, but also means it's not blendable. 

Cons: the product can be a little thick if you want to apply enough to be bold on the waterline. My lashes are short and fine and I noticed one of my shorter lashes got stuck towards my eye after a few hours of wear either due to my eye watering or movement of my lashes. Caused some irritations and I had to remove it. Not really the fault of the product itself, but it's something to keep in mind when applying and wearing it. 

Removes easily with micellar water on smooth surfaces like lids. If used between lashes you'll want an oil based cleanser for thorough removal. 

This is good product if you need good colors and staying power. If it were more comfortable it would be a holy grail product for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Looks great on the waterline
